list group * * //COMMENT
list group * * //COMMENT %%%%%%%%%%%% INITIALLY REMOVE ALL USER PRIVILEGES COMPLETELY %%%%%%%%%%%%
list group everyone * -//...
read group readonly * //...
read group app_revoke_read * -//app/...
read group * * -//app/.../core/build/deleteorgs.txt
read group * * -//app/.../core/build/**/asdf.txt
